title: Leo
description: The film follows Parthi, a caf√© owner and animal rescuer in Theog, who is pursued by gangsters Antony and Harold Das who suspect him to be Antony's estranged son, Leo.

title: Fighter
description: An inspiring tale of an underdog boxer who fights for his dreams.

title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: A scientist and his nephew embark on a daring expedition to the Earth's core.

title: Grayman
description: A former CIA agent is hunted by his former colleagues in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
description: Batman and Superman clash as a new threat arises that puts humanity in danger.

title: The Lost City
description: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour is kidnapped by a treasure hunter who believes her latest fiction is a map to a lost city.

title: The Kissing Booth
description: Elle Evans has always been the responsible, rule-abiding one in her friendship with the carefree, adventurous Noah Flynn. But when they decide to run a kissing booth at their high school's Spring Carnival, Elle finds herself unexpectedly falling for Noah, putting their friendship and her relationship with his older brother, Brad, at risk.

title: Beast
description: A former RAW agent, who is leading a peaceful life with his estranged wife and daughter, is forced to confront his dark past when a ruthless villain targets him and his family.

title: Tenet
description: Armed with only a single word - Tenet - and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a nameless protagonist journeys through a dark world of espionage, international conflict, and reality-bending time manipulation.

title: The Dark Knight
description: With the help of Jim Gordon and a district attorney, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham City. The triumvirate face off against the Joker, a psychopathic criminal who enjoys anarchy and thrusts Gotham into chaos.

title: Inception
description: A professional thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Extraction
description: A black market mercenary who specializes in rescuing kidnapped people is hired to rescue the son of an imprisoned gangster.

title: Fast & Furious
description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner infiltrates a street racing crew that hijacked lucrative rigs.

title: Mandela
description: The film chronicles Nelson Mandela's life from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.

title: Man of Steel
description: Clark Kent, a young man who discovers he has extraordinary powers and is not of Earth, takes to the skies to become Superman and save the world from imminent destruction.

title: Lucifer
description: The charming Devil, bored with his infernal duties, relocates to Los Angeles, opening a nightclub and becoming a consultant for the LAPD. But his carefree life is threatened by a celestial struggle brewing between good and evil.

title: Avatar
description: In the mid-22nd century, humans travel to Pandora, a moon rich in an unobtanium mineral, to mine it. A paraplegic former Marine, Jake Sully, becomes an avatar, a genetically engineered human-Na'vi hybrid, to infiltrate the Na'vi, who are hostile to human mining on their land.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy disappears, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret government experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one very strange little girl.

title: Money Heist (La Casa de Papel)
description: An eccentric criminal mastermind known as the Professor recruits a group of talented individuals to carry out a daring heist on the Royal Mint of Spain. The robbery plan is ambitious, and the crew is keeping a big secret.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with terminal cancer turns to cooking and selling crystal meth to secure his family's financial future. The series explores the themes of morality, death, greed, family, and the consequences of crime.
